summary: The module provides a command-line interface for the VizTracer tool, handling configuration loading, argument parsing, process attachment, and execution of various operations such as running code, combining tasks, handling modules, compressing/decompressing data, and managing lifecycle events including termination handling and cleanup.
business_intent: To enable users to easily invoke and control the VizTracer profiler from the command line, facilitating the collection, merging, and processing of execution traces for performance analysis and visualization.
